data.name: Maximum Velocity
data.detailed_description:
Maximum Velocity is a high-stakes, high-speed racing game looking to shake up the racing genre forever. Join your friends and take on challenges in an immersive, ever-changing world. Drift, drag, or sprint your way around Industrial City and discover hidden secrets to the lore and ever-evolving story.
Drive the way you want to.

Upgrade your vehicles to handle the way you want to. Make them as fast as you want or as drifty as you wish. You are in control of your car and how it handles. Unlock performance parts by exploring the city and doing challenges to get rewards and upgrades.
data.about_the_game:
Maximum Velocity is a high-stakes, high-speed racing game looking to shake up the racing genre forever. Join your friends and take on challenges in an immersive, ever-changing world. Drift, drag, or sprint your way around Industrial City and discover hidden secrets to the lore and ever-evolving story.
Drive the way you want to.

Upgrade your vehicles to handle the way you want to. Make them as fast as you want or as drifty as you wish. You are in control of your car and how it handles. Unlock performance parts by exploring the city and doing challenges to get rewards and upgrades.
data.short_description: Maximum Velocity is a Street Racing MMO That allows you to customize your cars the way you want to. Drift, drive, or drag and unlock cool rewards and skins to upgrade your builds.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 7
  • Processor: AMD B550
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: intel i5 6600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
